Plagueheart Signet
(2) Set: Whenever you use Life Tap, the mana cost of your next spell cast within 10 sec is reduced by 10%.
(4) Set: Your Curse of Agony will instantly deal damage to the target for 1 tick upon application.
(6) Set: Reduces the cooldown of your Dark Harvest by 5000 sec.
(8) Set: The periodic damage of your Corruption has a chance to inflict the enemy with a devastating plague, increasing their chance to be critically struck by spells by 2% and draining 240 health over 6 sec.
